summary: TAKATA RECALL  I BROUGHT MY CAR TO THE DEALER BECAUSE IT IS RECALLED.  THEY SAY IT WOULD TAKE ABOUT 10 DAYS TO 3 WEEKS, OR EVEN UP TO MORE THAN 2 MONTHS BECAUSE THEY DO NOT HAVE THE PARTS AVAILABLE FOR NOW.  IN THE MEAN TIME, I HAVE NO CAR TO DRIVE TO WORK.  IT IS RECALL BECAUSE OF THE COMPANY'S FAULT, THEN WHY DO I HAVE NO LOANER CAR?
